title: Get study-ready with Huawei's unbeatable back to school lineup
author: sponsored
article: Schools are set to fling open their gates in the coming weeks, so now is the time to ensure that you have all the right equipment in order to perform at your best on your new educational adventure – no matter whether you’re returning to the classroom or studying from home.
Thankfully, Huawei’s back to school lineup has you covered, whether you’re in the market for a high-performance laptop or an affordable wearable to ensure that you never miss a beat.
If you’re on the lookout for a laptop that will see you through your school day and beyond, look no further than the Huawei MateBook 13.

This portable machine boasts an impressive 13-inch 2K FullView touchscreen that delivers a fully immersive visual experience, while its 3:2 ratio is ideal for powering through reading and writing tasks.

It’s fast, too. The Huawei MateBook 13 features a 10th-generation Intel Core processor and Nvidia graphics that will make powering through schoolwork – be it writing an essay or editing and video – an absolute breeze, while its large battery will ensure you don’t run out of power halfway through the day.
If you do run out of juice, the laptop’s Quick Charge technology will equip you with more than two hours of battery life after just 15 minutes on charge.

If you’re after something even more powerful, the Huawei MateBook D15 has you covered. Not only does this laptop boast incredible power courtesy of Intel’s latest 11th-generation processor technology, but it also features a large 15.6-inch IPS FullView Display that lets every image burst with detail and clarity.
The screen has also been specially designed to relieve eye strain and vision fatigue, which ensures your eyes are kept fresh and sharp at every moment.

Despite arriving crammed full of innovative features, such as Huawei’s own Shark fin fan and fingerprint technologies, the Huawei MateBook D15 is slim and light enough to fit inside the smallest of backpacks.

The laptop measures in at just 16.9 mm-thick and tips the scales at just 1.56kg, but don’t let its lightness fool you — the stylish, smooth-to-the-touch body is strong and sturdy, for a versatile machine you can take just about anywhere.

For those after something even more portable, the Huawei MatePad 11 is the ultimate back to school tablet. It features a large 120Hz touchscreen complete with Huawei M-Pencil support, making it the perfect device for note-making, annotating and drawing perfectly formed diagrams.

For those looking to take their productivity to the next level, the MatePad 11 can be linked up to your laptop as a secondary screen, enabling you to work on multiple projects simultaneously and easily drag and drop files between screens.

For those looking to upgrade their wrist ahead of the return to the classroom, look no further than Huawei’s impressive smartwatch lineup. The Huawei Watch 3 is the ultimate wrist-worn companion, boasting a vibrant 1.43-inch AMOLED screen to ensure you never miss a deadline, and innovative eSIM technology that enables the wearable to be used as a standalone communication device - no phone required.

For those with a more refined taste, the Huawei Mate GT 2 Pro has your wrist covered. The premium smartwatch boasts a gorgeous, water-resistant design that’s sure to turn heads both inside and outside of the classroom, while its advanced activity tracking features - which includes precise data tracking for 100+ workout modes including climbing, outdoor running, and tennis - will ensure you stay active when you’re not sat at your desk.
For audiophiles, Huawei also offers a range of premium earbuds in the form of the Huawei FreeBuds Pro and FreeBuds 4i.

The former boasts refined noise cancellation to ensure you’re always focused on the task at hand, while the latter delivers 10-hours of continuous playback to ensure they’re on-hand throughout the entire school day.
